channel.title: Help with posion
channel.description:
well... I want to know if I can make it so the dragon dagger (s) posions.
After i hit someone with it, it never posions the person i want to kno if i change the posion delay from 9999999 to whatever. And how to change the max posion dmg.
Any Help?
